resources.string: Full stack Developer
Email copied to clipboard
About me

I am a developer committed to creating high quality software and passionate about clean code. Experienced in MVVM, MVI and MVC architectures, I specialise in mobile development using modern technologies such as Jetpack Compose, Kotlin and tools such as Retrofit, Room and Dagger Hilt.

My professional focus is on fostering best practices and helping teams maintain a clear and scalable structure in their projects. I value collaboration and always seek to optimize processes to ensure clean and maintainable code.
Although my strong point is mobile development, I am flexible and curious to work in different programming environments and face new technological challenges.
My Stack
Mobile
Other
Experience

During my time at NTT Data, I participated in key public and healthcare sector projects, such as CRM100, OBSAMU, and Valtermed, focused on Galicia and Asturias. My role centered on developing applications and systems, with a focus on technologies like Java, PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and Oracle Database.
This experience allowed me to apply agile methodologies, strengthen teamwork, and learn about messaging and event queuing systems.
Development of features usign java spring boot with mvc pattern.
Design and implementation of REST APIs.
Database management and query optimization.
Use of tools like Git, Docker, OKD, and JIRA for version control, deployment, and task tracking.

Currently, I work at Cwellt as a Mobile and FullStack Developer, contributing to projects related to airline flight and personnel management. Notable projects include WinOps (web and backend), WinOps Employee, WinOps EFB, and WinOps ECB.
Backend optimization: Research and implementation of a caching system to improve performance in web services.
Frontend development: Creation of React components focused on optimizing user experience and client performance.
Mobile app migration: I performed a complete migration of WinOps Employee from Xamarin to Native Android, using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose to modernize the app and improve maintenance.
